fields.name: customer_ref
fields.desc: 5 digit unique customer reference number which must remain with the customer and is used to identify them

fields.name: dunning_entries
fields.desc: count of previous times in collections.

fields.name: bureau_arrears
fields.desc: the customer's debt status with other lenders - Customers who are struggling will probably be struggling with other payments as well

fields.name: bureau_balance
fields.desc: total value of debts owed to other creditors

fields.name: notes
fields.desc: notes made by agents relating to the customer and their account including any recent interactions
